item.title: Spark Executor Memory
item.description: Over the past year, I’ve been building a fair amount of Spark ETL pipelines at work (via pyspark). The complexity of the pipelines I build have been growing. Evidently, this complexity required a better understanding in Spark’s inner workings. After a lot of reading, youtube videos, and docs, I think I have a beter grasp on Spark’s memory model. A lot of the information online can be quite confusing. And frankly, incorrect or out of date.
